sense.name: exchange or give something in exchange for
sense.commentary: NOTE: Includes metaphorical usage. NOTE: Includes SWAP OUT.
sense.examples: He swapped the bottle for a Bible. Why I swapped The Clash for Chopin. You can swap the left and right mouse buttons. You can swap Coke Zero with Coke and never know the difference! My grandfather and his friends like to swap war stories. We swapped out the old fans for new ones.

sense.name: COMPUTER SCIENCE: move a piece of program into memory
sense.examples: This program is not mapped in the physical memory, but private pages swapped to a disk.
